    void

    asks for input for each field of the menu item, name, description, food type, and price calls addMenuBoolean function if boolean returned is false, menu item is not added into the array else menu item is added into the array and confirmation message is printed onto the screen

    • setMenu

      sets array of menu items

    • printMenuItem

      public void printMenuItem(int i)
      prints a certain menu item, depending on the index input as the argument
      Parameters:
      i - index of the menu item to be accessed

    • addMenuBoolean

      public boolean addMenuBoolean(MenuItem menuItem)
      adds a menu item into the array of menu items if menu item to be added is already present in the array of menu items, operation is terminated
      Parameters:
      menuItem - menu item object
      Returns:
      true if menu item is not already present in the array of menu items, false if otherwise

    • addMenuItem

      public void addMenuItem()
      asks for input for each field of the menu item, name, description, food type, and price calls addMenuBoolean function if boolean returned is false, menu item is not added into the array else menu item is added into the array and confirmation message is printed onto the screen

    • removeMenuItem

      public void removeMenuItem()
      removes menu item from array of menu items

      public int findFood(String menuItemName)
      Parameters:
      menuItemName - menu item name
      Returns:
      index of menu item

    • printMenu

      public void printMenu()
      prints menu by accessing printMain(), printBeverage(), and printDesert()

      public void printMain()
      prints menu items of foodtype main by accessing the menu item array
